description: Dedicated signup flow for coaches at /coaches/signup with segmentation data collection

userStories.title: Add coachType field to User schema
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to store coach segmentation data.
acceptanceCriteria: Add coachType String? field to User model in prisma/schema.prisma
Run npx prisma migrate dev --name add_coach_type
npm run typecheck passes

userStories.title: Create coach signup page
userStories.description: As a prospective coach, I need a signup form to create my coach account.
acceptanceCriteria: Create /src/app/coaches/signup/page.tsx
Form fields: name (single input), email, coachType dropdown
Dropdown options: Personal trainer, Online coach, Gym owner, Strength coach, Nutritionist / RD, Other
When 'Other' selected, show free text input
Submit triggers magic link email
Show 'Check your email' confirmation after submit
Include 'Resend link' button
Style matches v2a design system (navy, coral, Outfit font)
npm run typecheck passes

userStories.title: Handle coach signup in auth flow
userStories.description: As a system, I need to create coach users when they click the magic link.
acceptanceCriteria: Store pending coach signup data (name, coachType) before sending magic link
On magic link click, create user with isCoach: true, coachType from stored data
Set coachTier: FREE, coachOnboardedAt: null
Redirect to /coach/dashboard after account creation
npm run typecheck passes

userStories.title: Update /coaches landing page CTAs
userStories.description: As a visitor, I need clear CTAs to start the coach signup flow.
acceptanceCriteria: Update 'Get Started' / primary CTA to link to /coaches/signup
Keep any secondary CTAs pointing to /coaches/signup
npm run typecheck passes

userStories.title: Add 'Talk to Sales' popup modal
userStories.description: As a visitor, I should see a fun popup when clicking Talk to Sales.
acceptanceCriteria: Add 'Talk to Sales' button to /coaches page if not already present
On click, show modal with text: 'lol we don't have a sales department, but you can email me if you want'
Show mailto link: john@baisics.app
Include Close button
Modal styled to match v2a design
npm run typecheck passes

userStories.title: End-to-end test coach signup flow
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to verify the complete flow works.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigate to /coaches, click Get Started
Fill out form with name, email, coach type
Receive magic link email (or verify in dev mode)
Click link, account created with isCoach: true
Redirected to /coach/dashboard
Onboarding wizard appears (coachOnboardedAt is null)
coachType stored correctly in database
